definition: to sow/to scatter/to spread/to broadcast/Taiwan pr. [bo4]

sentences.english: To begin with, "muzak"was intended simply to create a smoothing atmosphere.
sentences.chinese: 起初，音樂廣播網只是想營造一種和諧的氣氛。

sentences.english: Each network would be responsible for a third of the telecasts.
sentences.chinese: 每個廣播網都負責提供三分之一的電視廣播節目。
